name: PitchShift
description: Time-domain pitch shifter. Changes pitch without changing duration using granular techniques.

inputs.name: windowSize
inputs.description: Window size in seconds. Larger = better quality for lower pitches

inputs.name: pitchRatio
inputs.description: Pitch ratio. 1.0 = no shift, 2.0 = up one octave, 0.5 = down one octave

inputs.name: pitchDispersion
inputs.description: Amount of random pitch variation (0 to 1)

inputs.name: timeDispersion
inputs.description: Amount of random time variation (0 to 1)
